import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import blogContext from "../context/blogs/BlogContext"; import "./Write.css" import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" export default function Write(props) { const context = useContext(blogContext) const { addBlog } = context const history = useNavigate() const [blog, setBlog] = useState({ title: '', description: '', tag: '' }) const handleClick = () => { addBlog(blog) } const onChange = (e) => { setBlog({ ...blog, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return ( <>
